short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows <link> tags as a browseable dropdown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mostly for developers working with content-negotiated sites like legislation.gov.uk, this makes the browser a more useful tool for navigating sites that double as APIs by showing clickable versions of link tags and prioritising rel="alternate" representations. No more diving into View Source and hoping the result is readable!
